definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: The Chief Concierge will assign drivers available at that time for the journey.
sentences.chinese: 礼宾部主管将安排一名当班司机驾车送客人到机场。

sentences.english: The policeman on duty told him that since his defeat, the ex-Prime Minister had gone abroad.
sentences.chinese: 当班的警察告诉他自他失败后，前部长已经去国外了。

sentences.english: Carpenterfound No. 1 ballast tank unusual and report to the duty officer at once.
sentences.chinese: 木匠发现1号压载舱异常，立即报告当班驾驶员。

sentences.english: A policeman must not smoke while he is on duty.
sentences.chinese: 警察当班值勤时不得抽烟。

sentences.english: The next group of staff has yet to take over before the shift may not be off-the-job employees.
sentences.chinese: 在下一班员工尚未接班前当班员工不得离岗。

sentences.english: Liang ran into a riot in a factory when she was on duty for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 梁思敏第一次当班就赶上了一起工厂闹事。

sentences.english: Reports daily to the Team Leader - Stewarding on duty and receives assignments.
sentences.chinese: 每日向当班的餐务部领班汇报工作，并接受任务。

sentences.english: I hate those backseat drivers when I'm doing my duty.
sentences.chinese: 当班的时候我可不喜欢那些瞎指挥的人。

sentences.english: And the guard on duty has assured us everything is fine.
sentences.chinese: 而且当班警卫向我们报告了一切安好。

sentences.english: Please inform Duty officer to take off the electric sockets for all reefer containers.
sentences.chinese: 请你通知当班人员将所有冷藏集装箱的插座拔掉。

sentences.english: The state troopers who worked at the mansion were nervous, too.
sentences.chinese: 在官邸当班的州警也都很紧张。

sentences.english: If there are any problems, inform the duty engineer on safety watch.
sentences.chinese: 有什么问题可随时通知安全班确当班轮机员。

sentences.english: He found seven puppies and seven dogs during another shift.
sentences.chinese: 在他另一次当班期间，他又发现了7只狗崽和7只狗。

sentences.english: That means I am station supervisor when I am on shift.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着我在当班时要管理整个消防队。

definition: to hand over to the next workshift
to change shift/the next work shift/to relieve (a workman on the previous shift)/to take over the job
variant of 執勤|执勤[zhi2 qin2]
attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc
to act as substitute/to fill in for sb
to take time off/to take leave (e.g. for study)/to skive off work
to be on duty (of a security guard etc)
(of a security guard etc) to be on duty, keeping an eye on things/to keep watch
